Plot: In the summer of 1991, Arkady Renko has returned from exile and is back on the homicide squad in a newly democratic Moscow. When Arkady’s informant, Rudy Rosen, and his underworld bank-on-wheels are consumed in a ball of fire, Arkady finds himself in an investigation that points to the heart of Russia’s decaying infrastructure.
Characters: Max Albov, Irina Asanova, Margarita Benz, Stas Kolotov, Borya Gubenko, Peter Schiller (Red Square), Arkady Renko
